title: 'The Interview' Is Not The First Film To Rile A Government
teaser: Sony cancelling the release of "The Interview" has stirred up criticism, but Evan Osnos of the New Yorker tells NPR's Arun Rath this isn't the first time foreign governments have tried to suppress films.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
